FEEDBACK.QUESTION: Question
FEEDBACK.HEADER: You will receive an answer from a representative of NACID at the specified e-mail address.
FEEDBACK.SUBMITTED: Your feedback has been received and will be processed. In case you have specified a valid e-mail address, we will contact you if necessary.
HOME.CHECK_PARAGRAPH_FIRST: In this section of the portal Apostilles Register you are able to verify an already issued Apostille certificate. For this purpose, you need to enter the 13-symbol
HOME.CHECK_PARAGRAPH_SECOND: of the apostille, which you can find at the end of the paper/electronic Apostille in the field
HOME.CHECK_PARAGRAPH_THIRD: In order to be allowed by the system to view the Apostille-certified document, it is necessary to pass the “Anti-spam” check shown below and press the “Verify” button.
HOME.CHECK_STATUS_TITLE: Checking the status of an application
HOME.CHECK_STATUS_PARAGRAPH_FIRST: In this section of the  Apostilles Register portal you you have the opportunity to check the status of an
HOME.CHECK_STATUS_PARAGRAPH_SECOND: To do this, you need to enter
HOME.CHECK_STATUS_PARAGRAPH_THIRD: send to the e-mail address specified by you in your e-application.
HOME.VERIFY_PANEL1_PARAGRAPH: Issuance of certificate APOSTILLE for educational and certification of documents, issued by institutions in the system of pre-school and school education
HOME.VERIFY_PANEL2_PARAGRAPH: Issuance of certificate APOSTILLE for educational and certification of documents, issued by higher education institutions and scientific organizations in the Republic of Bulgaria
HOME.VERIFY_PANEL4_PARAGRAPH: Provision of complex administrative service Issuance of certificate APOSTILLE for certification of professional qualification in a non-regulated profession, attained on the territory of the Republic of Bulgaria, necessary for access or for prosecution of a regulated profession on the territory of another country
HOME.VERIFY_PANEL4_TITLE: APOSTILLE for professional qualification in a non-regulated profession
HOME.VERIFY_PANEL5_PARAGRAPH: Issuance of certificate APOSTILLE for educational and certification of documents, issued by higher education institutions and scientific organizations in the Republic of Bulgaria
HOME.VERIFY_PANEL5_TITLE: APOSTILLE for usage of rights from completed educational-qualification degree
HOME.VERIFY_PARAGRAPH_FIRST: The National Center for Information and Documentation provides services for issuance of Apostille certificate of
HOME.VERIFY_PARAGRAPH_SECOND: educational and certification documents issued by institutions in the system of pre-school, school and vocational education and training, by higher schools and scientific organizations, by the Ministry of Education and Science and its units.
HOME.VERIFY_PARAGRAPH_THIRD: Detailed information can be found in the section
HOME.INFO_PARAGRAPH_FIRST: The National Center for Information and Documentation provides the service Issuance of APOSTILLE certificate. Information about the certification of different types of documents, descriptions of all services, forms and samples of applications and documents, the types of services Regular, Fast, and Express can be found in the section
